body.name: The Original Proper Popper Microwave Popcorn Popper, Silicone Popcorn Maker, Collapsible Bowl BPA Free & Dishwasher Safe - (Turquoise)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 mins
features: The Convenient Way To Make Popcorn -The Proper Popper whips up to 15 cups of popcorn in under 4 minutes. No waiting for a slow stove top popcorn maker. No noise or breakdowns from an electric hot popper. No potentially harmful lining of microwavable popcorn bags. No picking up overflow popcorn from the floor. The lid prevents the kernels from popping out.

Simple To Use - Fill popcorn kernels up to the line marked inside the bowl and insert it in the microwave! The Built in handles allow you to remove the bowl from the microwave with ease. You can choose to add oil, salt or other exotic spices- whatever you prefer - either way it will taste delicious! Enjoy movie night!

Lightweight & Easy To Clean & Store- You can easily collapse the bowl from a height of 5.7” to 2.2” allowing the bowl to fit in almost any kitchen drawer or pantry. Perfect for college dorms. The slim, lightweight and collapsible design makes it great for traveling or limited pantry space. The Proper Popper is super durable, eco-friendly and dishwasher safe. It’s made of high quality silicone which makes it easy to hand wash. Save yourself the trouble of rough scrubbing other popcorn makers.

TOXIN FREE: Why use a microwave bag when you’re ultimately going to put the popcorn in a bowl? Now you can stop using potentially harmful popcorn microwave bags and also help save the environment by not adding to the trash! The Proper Popper is made from 100% Food Grade Silicone BPA and PVC free. This is the best popcorn popper for making a healthy treat that the entire family will love.

Lifetime Warranty - We confidently stand behind our product and we want to make sure all of our customers are 100% satisfied. If you are not satisfied with our product we will refund your money guaranteed!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The “Proper” Way to make Popcorn... The Original Proper Popper is the newest breakthrough in 21st century popcorn making. As a faster, healthier and more convenient way of making popcorn, you can pop up to 15 cups of Fresh popcorn in just 2-4 minutes! With the Proper Popper you can avoid eating unhealthy buttery microwave popcorn. You can eliminate the wait time of stove top or electric popcorn poppers. You can also control the taste of your popcorn by simply adding your own spices, oil or just plain kernels. It’s your choice- either way it will taste great! The Process is Easy... 1. Simply unfold the popcorn bowl to it’s full size and remove the lid. 2. Add kernels until one of the two marked lines- depending on how much popcorn you wish to pop! 3. If you wish, add any desired seasoning or oil. 4. Gently put the lid back on the bowl and heat in the microwave for 2-4 minutes. (heating times will vary depending on the power of your microwave) 5. For best results, stop microwave when popping slows to 2 to 3 seconds between pops. 6. Carefully open the microwave and remove the bowl using the convenient handles. Remove the lid with caution due to heat and steam. Bowl, lid and handles are HOT!

Clean up… Feeling lazy? Dishwasher Safe! Avoid the mess of scrubbing down greasy pots and electric poppers.The High quality 100% food grade silicone Proper Popper is easy to clean. Either do a quick rinse with soap and water or toss it in the dishwasher. The bowl is collapsible from 5.7” to 2.2” for easy storage without taking up too much space in your kitchen. This bowl is a great item for traveling due to its convenient collapsible technology.

Party Time! The Proper Popper is the perfect item to have when it comes to having company over. Whether you want to kick back & relax to watch a movie, or to watch the football game. There will be plenty of popcorn for you & your guests! Bowl is starting to empty? Just simply make another batch your definitely going to want more due to its consistent delicious taste! Great Gift These bowls will make a great gift for you or any loved one. Put a smile on your kids face, your workers, co-workers , or your best friends. They will make perfect Christmas presents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow!!! Best natural popcorn ever!
reviews.reviewText: This worked perfectly! Followed instructions and it left little to no unopened kernels on first try. It tastes wonderful. After popped, added a little salt and sprinkled some Parmesan cheese. And storage is so convenient; it collapses neatly. I used to own the electric presto popper but that took up so much cabinet space. And I love that you avoid the toxicity of the bagged popcorn. Lastly, price cannot be beaten! Buy it - you won’t be disappointed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great popcorn popper, and a space saving one!
reviews.reviewText: My hubby rolled his eyes when i told him i wanted this popper. I have ended up donating so many air poppers that he kept buying the bagged microwave popcorn.Omg this works like a charm! I ended up cooking mine 2 min 20 sec on high because our microwave tends to burn on the popcorn setting. There was no burning, very few unpopped, and no oil used at all! Aside from that you can used the bowl to eat it from. I might get a second one! It also collapses down and is super easy to store. I'm really thrilled with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had purchased air poppers, have eaten popcorn made on the stove, and of course had bags of microwavable popcorn, but this is by far the easiest, best tasting popcorn yet. No need to pre-oil or anything, just pour in a set amount and set at 4 mins (my microwave setting) and voila! I had a family member visiting when I showed him this and he was so impressed with it (he makes it on the stove usually) he had called other family members and told them about this popcorn "thingy". Since he was so impressed with it I ended up buying a second one and sending it to him. This thing does what it claims; easy to make popcorn, easy to clean, and it's silicone material makes it easy to pop down flat and store easily. Makes a great little gift for those who love popcorn in your life

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I admit, I wasn’t expecting much when I bought this. I’ve tried a lot of cheap devices to pop corn and it’s gone terribly, I didn’t think such a simple product could do the job but it’s really great and easy to use. It’s also easy to clean and store, which is a plus—I have too many things to store in my kitchen as is, and being able to squish this up to fit in my cabinet is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved the ease of microwaving popcorn and almost no unpopped corns. The thing I hate is that it is so hot after 3-1/2 minutes. It would be better if the handles had some kind of cover to keep them from getting so hot. It doesn't cool off very fast either. But it is a good size and works as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars flattens down to fit in small cabinet spaces
reviews.reviewText: For a quick & easy bowl of popcorn, this popper is perfect. It pops most of the kernels fast and w/o burning. It cleans up easily and folds flat so tucks away in my cabinet . Five stars for this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome popcorn popper.
reviews.reviewText: I have had air poppers and cheap plastic microwave poppers and popped over the stove. This product is great for someone that doesn’t have a lot of room in the kitchen as well. I have a small kitchen and this pops down flat and goes right into a drawer. This is the most evenly popped popcorn I have had even better than bagged popcorn almost all the seeds were popped and none of the popcorn was burned. Also you don’t worry about it being plastic leaching bad things into your popcorn and if you wanna have healthy no oil popcorn this is easy to do or you could melt some coconut oil and put it right in there, I made a pomegranate popcorn and put dark chocolate as a Christmas snack. I like the fact this isn’t glass I looked at a lot of popcorn poppers on Amazon and there were a lot of glass ones and with a small child that would be not a good idea and you don’t have to worry about this breaking. My favorite part is it doesn’t take any room and affordable. It was an all-around awesome purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thing is great! It folds up to fit almost anywhere. It's so easy to use, even my husband can handleIt (well, almost). And one pack of that Amish popcorn is perfect. If I were back in my Super Mom days, I'd makeup little pre-measured pack of the kernels for my kids to havre on-hand for after-school snacks. But now that they are grown and klutzy, I’ll save that idea for my husband, Mister Popcorn!
Best thing since the at home oil popper, in fact this is better, buy this! You wont regret it.
I was skeptical after opening the package to see how lightweight, and the flimsy top. I add a small bit of oil first - mostly to make salt adhere better and this works great.

I have just received this and made three batches of popcorn using the instructions and all cooked perfectly! The popcorn all popped evenly, no burnt kernels and no un-popped kernels at the bottom of the bowl. As long as you listen for the pops at the end, you will know how long to cook this based on your microwave settings. Easy to clean and love that it folds down for easy storage. Very happy.
Got burned in my microwave oven.Smoked my microwave oven. Now I have to buy a new one.Do not waste your time and safety with this product.

reviews.reviewTitle: Works very well when you get the timing down
reviews.reviewText: We had an air popper and it didn't work so well so we thought we would give this a try. The only trick is the amount combined with timing. If you let it go too long then portions of the popcorn will burn. However if you get the time correct with the power of your microwave, it does a wonderful job of popping nearly all of the kernels.
